trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Bloomington
There were no other sightings in Bloomington on or around November 15th 2010
divs: sighting detailsi was walking across a courtyard on the indiana university campus with a friend and glanced up for no reason--it was cloudy out. i saw this orb-shaped object moving at a good 20-30mph across the sky. it appeared to have one light on the front (similar to an eyeball). the white was a white or beige color, but the craft itself glowed dimly a pinkish orange color. it moved in a very direct, straight path below the clouds, but higher than the treetops. i would estimate it to be about the size of a regular suv. i would never consider myself a ufo person, not even with an "open mind". but this ufo startled me and my friend and i followed it, running, for a couple yards trying to figure out whether or not it was a ufo. there was no way it could be a balloon--because of the front beam\light it had. it finally went out of sight over trees and into the far distance. we were able to watch it for about 2-3 minutes. it never occurred to me to report it until i was trying to tell my mother, who asked me to look it up, but no other sightings were reported, unfortunately.
